universal_events.event_name: Reading Week for 12 Week Summer Semester
universal_events.event_description: Study break, 12-week summer semester, except Bachelor of Education.

universal_events.event_name: Reading Week for 6 Week Spring Semester
universal_events.event_description: Spring six-week semester study break, no scheduled academic activities.

universal_events.event_name: Reading Week for 6 Week Summer Semester
universal_events.event_description: Summer six-week semester study break, no scheduled academic activities.

Last day to drop 12-week summer semester courses and receive a 100 per cent refund of tuition and ancillary fees. Last day to withdraw from six-week spring session courses and receive a 50 per cent refund of tuition fees. Last day to withdraw from six-week spring session courses without academic consequences (i.e., without receiving a grade). Courses dropped after this date will be recorded on the academic transcript with a grade of W to indicate withdrawal.

Last day to drop 12-week summer semester courses and receive a 50 per cent refund of tuition fees. Last day to withdraw from 12-week summer semester courses without academic consequences (i.e., without receiving a grade). Courses dropped after this date will be recorded on the academic transcript with a grade of W to indicate withdrawal.
Last day to withdraw from six-week spring session courses. Active six-week spring session courses will be graded by instructors.
Canada Day, no scheduled academic activities.
Civic holiday, no scheduled academic activities.
